statements: SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas;
SELECT area_name, region FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_index FROM BiodiversityAreas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(biodiversity_index) AS average_index FROM BiodiversityAreas;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE region='North America' ORDER BY area_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_id, area_name, biodiversity_index FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE area_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY biodiversity_index ASC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, region FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.8 AND region IN ('Europe', 'Asia') ORDER BY region ASC, area_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM BiodiversityAreas ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, region, biodiversity_index FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE region='South America' AND biodiversity_index < 0.5 ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas;
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_index FROM BiodiversityAreas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT species_name FROM SpeciesData WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM BiodiversityAreas JOIN SpeciesData ON BiodiversityAreas.id = SpeciesData.area_id GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE area_name = 'Forest' ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT species_name, biodiversity_index FROM SpeciesData JOIN BiodiversityAreas ON BiodiversityAreas.id = SpeciesData.area_id WHERE BiodiversityAreas.biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT area_name, AVG(biodiversity_index) AS avg_biodiversity FROM BiodiversityAreas GROUP BY area_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM SpeciesData;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE biodiversity_index > (SELECT AVG(biodiversity_index) FROM BiodiversityAreas);
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_score FROM areas ORDER BY biodiversity_score DESC;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name, conservation_status FROM species JOIN conservation ON species.species_id = conservation.species_id WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) AS species_count FROM areas JOIN species ON areas.area_id = species.area_id GROUP BY area_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT area_name, SUM(biodiversity_score) AS total_biodiversity FROM areas GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY total_biodiversity DESC;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, scientific_name FROM species WHERE species_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_score FROM areas WHERE biodiversity_score > 75 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT s.species_name, c.conservation_status FROM species s JOIN conservation c ON s.species_id = c.species_id WHERE c.conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM conservation WHERE area_id IN (SELECT area_id FROM areas WHERE area_name LIKE '%Forest%');
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_score FROM areas WHERE biodiversity_score > 0.5;
SELECT species_id, species_name, habitat_type FROM species WHERE endangered = true;
SELECT * FROM observations WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT area_id, conservation_objective, target_species_id FROM conservation_plans;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE endangered = TRUE;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM species ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT observation_id, species_name, observation_date FROM observations WHERE num_individuals > 10 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_score FROM areas WHERE biodiversity_score < 0.5;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, endangered FROM species WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' AND endangered = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_areas
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_areas
SELECT * FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered'
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM biodiversity_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species WHERE conservation_status IS NULL
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_areas;
SELECT area_name, biodiversity_index FROM biodiversity_areas ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT a.area_name, s.species_name FROM biodiversity_areas a JOIN area_species b ON a.area_id = b.area_id JOIN species s ON b.species_id = s.species_id;
SELECT a.area_name, t.threat_name FROM biodiversity_areas a JOIN area_threats b ON a.area_id = b.area_id JOIN threats t ON b.threat_id = t.threat_id ORDER BY a.area_name ASC, t.threat_name DESC;
